reviews.text:
It was such a beautiful day, my girl and I went for a long Sunday drive. On our way home we were looking for Pho soup, as it usually happens.
Serendipity...

First time at Afra Grill but it won't be the last. As others have said, this is a Chipotle-style restaurant where you build your meal. 

The experience was...
Afra grill is the most authentic  African food that I have had. The service was so great and quick. It was super easy to order your plate of food. The...
